item.title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
item.description:
Title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Games Farm , ARTillery
Publisher: Grindstone
Release Date: Jan 21, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jan 21, 2025




About This Game

Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike, horde-survivor game with top-notch graphics. Choose one of the damned heroes and attempt to pass the Gods' test by fighting your way through waves of mythical adversaries.

If you succeed in all the trials, you will become the chosen Jotunnslayer.

Engage in adrenaline-fueled battles, fighting off endless waves of enemies as you strive to survive. Complete various objectives, defeat the final boss, and earn the ultimate prizes.


Take on challenging missions during each run to test your skills and enrich your journey through the Nine Worlds.These quests may involve completing specific objectives or overcoming additional obstacles as you battle relentless enemies on your way to the final challenge.

Improve your abilities with meta-progression systems that offer unlockable perks, in-game skills, or upgrades. As you progress further, you'll gain access to new abilities, weapons, and bonuses that allow you to customize your playstyle and improve your chances of survival.

Select from a roster of diverse characters, each equipped with unique skills, abilities, and weapons. Mix and match combinations to refine your builds and overcome the many challenges posed by the Hordes of Hel.

Face a variety of increasingly challenging Boss enemies as you progress through the game. Outmaneuver and defeat these formidable foes using the environment, your skills, and abilities to gain the advantage and achieve victory.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 or AMD™ Ryzen 5 2600x
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or Intel® Arc™ A380
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: System Requirements subject to change as development continues
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700 or AMD™ Ryzen 7 3700x
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or Intel® Arc™ A580
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: System Requirements subject to change as development continues

item.title: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders
item.description:
Title: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders
Genre: Indie , Racing , Sports
Developer: Megagon Industries
Publisher: Megagon Industries
Franchise: Lonely Mountains
Release Date: Jan 21, 2025




About This Game

Take a deep breath, count to three, and… go! Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders is a game that balances serious challenge with a relaxing atmosphere. Slice through deep snow, skitter over ice lakes, and leap into the air in spectacular jumps, bringing your friends along for the ride.

Snow Riders also adds a brand new feature to the Lonely Mountains world – online multiplayer! Work your way down the mountain as a team in co-op, carefully sharing your limited checkpoints, or compete in a breakneck race to the base in versus mode. Available for 2-8 players, with multiplatform crossplay.

Perform daredevil tricks or try to best your time for a spot on the leaderboard. Or you can take the road less travelled, discovering shortcuts as you explore the slope. Unlock new equipment, outfits and tricks as you play!

Whether you’re looking for a challenge or a chilled out vacation with friends, Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders is the perfect winter getaway.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.

item.title: SACRIFICE VILLAINS
item.description:
Title: SACRIFICE VILLAINS
Genre: Adventure
Developer: CLOCKUP
Publisher: Shiravune
Franchise: Shiravune
Release Date: Jan 20, 2025




About This Game

GAMEPLAY & FEATURES


  • 30 minutes of story
  • A linear visual novel
  • Full Japanese voice acting by seasoned professionals

STORY


Ever since the day the SUPERVILLAINS appeared, CRIME has been the king of the streets of SCUM CITY —
But in the center of this hive of evil sits a paradise, and its name is JUSTOPIAN WARD.

Standing opposed to the dastardly villains, the SUPERHEROES built this autonomous safe zone as a thriving base of VIRTUE amidst the CHAOS around them.
Its FOUNDER —its MAYOR —its CHAMPION —is none other than JUSTOPIA himself, the ultimate hero, the bane of the countless villains he has brought to account for their innumerable sins.
As the creator and chairman of the HERO SOCIETY , Justopia also commands the other heroes in their tireless efforts to wipe crime from the face of the city and bring peace to the world at large.

Yet the conniving VILLAINS grow stronger and stronger, and the HEROES find themselves walloped rather than walloping... and some of their number pledge themselves to the darkness in acts of foulest BETRAYAL !

To whom should Justopia turn for help, if not to the ASYLUM ? This rehabilitative institution brings villains to the light, and who should be fit to lead it—if not YOU ?

Capture S-rank Villains and turn them into heroes as quickly and efficiently as you can.
It's up to you to reform these filthy scumbags—and set their powers back to work for the cause of JUSTICE !

CHARACTERS



Night Charger (Voice: Matsuri Sugihara)
POWERS: Electricity-based superhuman regeneration, senses, and physical and athletic abilities.

A lone-wolf villain who commits her crimes solo on the streets of Scum City, targeting criminal organizations such as the mafia with bank robberies and art thefts while also taking jobs as superpowered muscle for hire. Her lack of trust in those around her and thorny personality often bring her into conflict with other villains, and she will not hesitate to oppose former allies in the pursuit of personal profit.

Despite the evident selfishness of her motives, her actions have often saved those weaker than her, giving her a powerful base of support among a certain segment of the population.


Bad Lotion (Voice: Yuki Akashi)
POWERS: Generates a sticky fluid that she can manipulate at will.

The leader of the gang that runs Scum City's slums. After a difficult childhood, she leveraged her powers and charms to turn the tables on her environment, eventually rising to a position of effective control over her town.

She is convinced that she is the cutest thing on the planet; however, she can be remorselessly violent against even the people in her service.


Madam Venom (Voice: Shino Nakano)
POWERS: Manifests poisons with various effects and can store them within her body.

As the boss of a major mafia organization, Madam Venom is known by everyone as a key player in Scum City. She harbors an ambition to overthrow the two Witches of the Towers, the city's most powerful forces, and take their domains for her own. Her base of support includes many of the criminals within the walls of the rehabilitation facility called the Asylum.

She is convinced that she is the most beautiful thing on the planet and backs her claim up with both fearsome powers and unbreakable confidence. Naturally, her experience has also lent her formidable technique.


Justopia (Voice: Uzuki Inari)
POWERS: Physical invincibility, flight, and infinite vitality!

A world-famous superhero and the mayor of Justopia City. With his immovable smile, magnanimous heart, and ever-burning passion for justice, he has become a symbol to people everywhere.

For all his honesty, kindness, and altruism, he has little mercy for the villains who have turned their backs to the light. His power and overwhelming vigor have laid low every ne'er-do-well ever to cross his path.

Villains fear him, because they know that once you've seen his smile, you've already lost.


THE JUSTICE (Voice: Yuka Kanematsu)
The municipal AI that manages Justopia City.
It manages not only the Asylum but the city's facilities and daily routines, optimizing to increase the population of superhuman defenders.

THE JUSTICE seeks to create a utopia, and the citizens accept its interventions as a fact of life.


Protagonist (Voice: -)
The young director of the Asylum, a facility intended to rehabilitate villains. Under the direction of THE JUSTICE, the city's AI, he is responsible for turning villains' lives around.

He hates villains fundamentally because they once destroyed his life and has since turned his serious work ethic to the pursuit of justice. Though troubled by feelings of powerlessness due to his own lack of superpowers in a world increasingly overflowing with them, he now feels validated by his new appointment as director, which he owes to both his intellect and his compatibility with the assignment.

He greatly respects Justopia, who recognized his talents and elevated him to his position.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game may contain mild violence, mild cussing, and revealing outfits.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10/11
    • Processor: Core2 Duo
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1728×1080 or higher; VRAM 64MB or more
    • DirectX: Version 9.0c
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectSound Support
    Recommended:
    • Processor: Core i3
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Storage: 7 GB available space

item.title: Settlements Rising
item.description:
Title: Settlements Rising
Genre: Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: The Catalyst Crew
Publisher: The Catalyst Crew
Franchise: The Catalyst Crew
Release Date: Jan 20, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Oct 2, 2024




About This Game

Settlements Rising is a city-building and colony management simulation game set in medieval times. The game offers extensive depth with dozens of professions and resources available to the player. Each profession features villagers with their own animations and work cycles, creating a living colony experience in the game. It allows for micromanagement through trade, limited resources, production chains, and production data.



Villagers have their own life cycles. They can work in over 35 different professions. Each villager has needs for hunger, energy, health, and warmth. When they're hungry, they eat, and when their inventory runs out of food, they purchase more. When their energy depletes while working or during cold weather, they return home to rest. They are born, grow, receive education, and eventually age and pass away. They gain experience in their jobs. They acquire character traits either from birth or later in life.



At specific intervals, you will be presented with a set of random cards from which you can choose the one that best suits your needs. You can use these enhancement cards according to your requirements. These cards are for single use, but you can choose to save them for future games. In each new game, you can start with a few of the cards you've saved.


In the game, you can earn gold by mining, trading, and conducting raids. Traders visit your village at regular intervals. They buy some resources and sell others. The prices vary from one trader to another, allowing you to buy low and sell high. Additionally, build trading ships and manage your resources by trading with neighboring villages based on the resources they import and export.

Construct exploration ships for exploration missions and send them out. Depending on the mission's risk, you can earn various rewards. These rewards can be gold, resources, or enhancement cards.


As the resources of your village increase, raiders will periodically attack, attempting to plunder your resources. To defend against raiders, build towers and walls. Train villagers as archers or swordsmen, hiring them as military units for a certain salary.



AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Our game utilizes AI in several ways to enhance the player experience. Profile images for villagers are generated using generative AI. Translations for languages other than French, English, Turkish, and German are assisted by AI. Lastly, some of the music tracks in the game are created with AI.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2.4 GHz or Intel equivalent
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GT 730 2GB | AMD Radeon 550 2GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2.4 GHz or Intel equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti 4GB | AMD RX 560 4GB
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: Yield! Fall of Rome
item.description:
Title: Yield! Fall of Rome
Genre: Indie , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Billionworlds
Publisher: Daedalic Entertainment
Franchise: Daedalic Entertainment
Release Date: Jan 20, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jan 20, 2025




About This Game

The year is 401 AD, spring is in the air as the sun is slowly setting. What seems like a completely normal night by the river of the Rhine is turning out to be the beginning of the end for the world's longest lasting empire!

Yield! Fall of Rome is a turn-based 4X strategy game with fast-paced tactical gameplay set in the time of the imminent fall of the Roman Empire. Conquer provinces, expand your dominion, and immerse yourself in the drama of ancient Rome’s final days.

Forge Your Empire - Rewrite History!

The once mighty Roman Empire struggles to govern its vast realm. It is up to you to take advantage and lead your nation into the future.

  • Take command of one of eight playable factions* - each with unique units, buildings, strengths and weaknesses.

  • Individual Campaigns for each faction*- achieve long term objectives over multiple missions.

  • Advance your faction’s society according to the policies you choose - will you adapt Roman culture or keep the traditional ways?

*(limited at Early Access launch; more added with free updates during Early Access)

Strategize, Conquer, Triumph!

Your strategic choices will determine your fate. Every move counts, and every choice echoes through history. Victory awaits those who choose wisely. Will you build an empire or crumble like ancient ruins?

  • Focused 4X experience - explore, expand, exploit, exterminate.

  • Gameplay designed to focus on tactics - outwit your opponents in matches won't take all day.

  • Decide how to deal with the Roman presence on the map and outmaneuver your competitors - will you choose trade or conquest?

  • Fulfill a variety of objectives to earn Crowns - the first player to reach the set amount of Crowns wins the match!

The Thrill Of Fresh Conquest Awaits!

Conquer provinces, expand your dominion, and immerse yourself in the drama of ancient Rome. Whether you focus on the grand scheme or individual battles - each mission, a fresh saga; each campaign, a new epic.

  • Campaigns: A string of solo challenges with overspanning objectives.

  • Multiplayer: Compete with other players in ranked and unranked matches.

  • Seasons: Aim for the top spots on the leaderboard and in additional dynamically generated Campaigns.

  • Custom games: Adjust the game to your liking - weight win conditions differently or even turn some of them off completely; give the Romans weaker or stronger presence; choose the map size from tiny to epic and decide for classic map borders or cylindrical wrapping.

  • You don’t have the time?: play by cloud and give each player up to 24 hours to make their turn.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS
